title: Network Engineer Intern
description: Assist with the installation of internet networks to ensure optimal performance
Troubleshoot and resolve network issues efficiently
Maintain and repair network devices to ensure continuous operation
Identify and analyze network problems to provide effective solutions
Provide technical support and assistance to customers or users
